\w And|strong="H3671"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* said, \w Who|strong="H4310"\w* art \w thou|strong="H3588"\w*? \w And|strong="H3671"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* answered, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w Ruth|strong="H7327"\w* \w thy|strong="H5921"\w* handmaid: \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* \w therefore|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H5921"\w* \w skirt|strong="H3671"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H5921"\w* handmaid; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* art \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w near|strong="H5921"\w* \w kinsman|strong="H1350"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* said, \w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w thou|strong="H3212"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*: \w thou|strong="H3212"\w* hast \w shown|strong="H3190"\w* \w more|strong="H4480"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* latter end \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w beginning|strong="H7223"\w*, inasmuch \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w thou|strong="H3212"\w* \w followedst|strong="H3212"\w* \w not|strong="H1115"\w* \w young|strong="H1115"\w* \w men|strong="H6223"\w*, \w whether|strong="H4480"\w* \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* \w or|strong="H4480"\w* \w rich|strong="H6223"\w*.

\w And|strong="H8184"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* said, These \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \add measures\add* of \w barley|strong="H8184"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* said, Go \w not|strong="H5414"\w* \w empty|strong="H7387"\w* \w unto|strong="H5414"\w* \w thy|strong="H5414"\w* \w mother-in-law|strong="H2545"\w*.
